Article Title: India match schedule for T20 World Cup: All India upcoming matches, timings, venues
Article Text:
PTI Photo

Special dinner for Team India at Gautam Gambhir‚Äôs house in Delhi | T20 World Cup

Match Team vs Team Result Venue Date Match 1 India vs USA India won by 29 runs Wankhede Stadium, Mumbai Sat, Feb 7, 2026 Match 2 India vs Namibia Yet to be played Arun Jaitley Stadium, Delhi Thu, Feb 12, 2026 Match 3 India vs Pakistan Yet to be played R. Premadasa Stadium, Colombo Sun, Feb 15, 2026 Match 4 India vs Netherlands Yet to be played Narendra Modi Stadium, Ahmedabad Wed, Feb 18, 2026

Team India, under the leadership of Suryakumar Yadav , began their T20 World Cup 2026 campaign on a winning note, defeating the United States of America by 29 runs at the Wankhede Stadium on Saturday.The Men in Blue will next face Namibia on Thursday at the Arun Jaitley Stadium in Delhi. That will be followed by a marquee showdown against arch-rivals Pakistan on Sunday, February 15. The much-anticipated clash is set to take place at the R. Premadasa Stadium in Colombo and is expected to be one of the highlights of the group stage.India will wrap up their Group A fixtures with a match against the Netherlands on February 18 at the Narendra Modi Stadium in Ahmedabad.As defending champions, India enter the tournament with a chance to achieve something truly special. In a format where supremacy is often short-lived and margins razor-thin, the team has an opportunity to defend a men‚Äôs T20 World Cup title ‚Äî an achievement that would further strengthen their legacy in the shortest format. India are also aiming to become the first nation to lift the T20 World Cup trophy on home soil.A successful campaign would also make India the first team to win the men‚Äôs T20 World Cup three times.India‚Äôs journey in the tournament began with glory in the inaugural edition in 2007, when they defeated Pakistan in the final at the New Wanderers Stadium in Johannesburg under the captaincy of Mahendra Singh Dhoni. That iconic triumph laid the foundation for India‚Äôs dominance in T20 cricket.The second title, however, came after a long wait. Seventeen years later, India returned to the summit in 2024, with Rohit Sharma leading the side to a memorable title win. India edged past South Africa in a thrilling final to finally end their prolonged title drought.Now, with momentum on their side, India will look to script another historic chapter in T20 World Cup history.
Article Summary: India begin their t20 world cup 2026 campaign against usa on saturday. The men in blue will next face namibia on thursday at the arun jaitley stadium in delhi. That will be followed by a marquee showdown against arch-rivals pakistan on february 15.

Article Title: Manipur deputy CM visits Churachandpur, calls for reconciliation through sports
Article Text: CHURACHANDPUR: Manipur deputy CM Losi Dikho became the first politician from the state to visit Churachandpur since ethnic violence erupted between Kuki-Zo and Meitei communities in May 2023, using a football tournament to press for peace and reconciliation, reports MK Henry.Dikho arrived by helicopter on Saturday to attend the closing ceremony of the sixth edition of the Zomi National Day Football Tournament, drawing cheers from packed stands. Calling for calm across Manipur, he said: "Meiteis in Imphal miss you all. Govt is keen to bring back peace, normalcy and development."Urging communities to learn from history, Dikho referenced the Kuki-Naga conflict. "We don't want such incidents to occur again," he said, invoking Christian values and adding that reconciliation must lead the way. Sports, he said, could help heal divides: "In sports, there is no religion, no caste, no boundary. Peace can return through sports if we really want it."
Article Summary: Manipur deputy cm losi dikho is first politician from the state to visit churachandpur since ethnic violence erupted between kuki-zo and meitei communities in may 2023. He arrived by helicopter on saturday to attend the closing ceremony of the sixth edition of the zomi national day football tournament.

Article Title: Delhi CM Rekha Gupta, Shikhar Dhawan participates in inauguration ceremony of Delhi Khel Mahakumbh
Article Text: Delhi chief minister Rekha Gupta, along with Delhi minister Ashish Sood and former Indian cricketer Shikhar Dhawan , participated in the inauguration ceremony of the Delhi Khel Mahakumbh on Friday.Delhi Khel Mahakumbh, an initiative of the Directorate of Education and Sports, Government of NCT of Delhi, aims to strengthen grassroots sports participation and talent identification across the capital.The inaugural edition of the Delhi Khel Mahakumbh will be held from February 13 across 16 venues in the capital, featuring thousands of young athletes competing in basketball, football, athletics, kabaddi, wrestling, squash, and volleyball, with representation from all 12 districts of Delhi.While speaking to ANI, former Indian cricketer Shikhar Dhawan said, "The Delhi Khel Mahakumbh is a good step. It will encourage the youth. Good infrastructure will be provided. Proper guidance will be available. I am confident that many champions will emerge."CM Rekha Gupta said that Delhi hosted its biggest-ever sports extravaganza, with about 20,500 athletes participating, and congratulated Delhi's residents, competitors, and the sports ministry for making it happen."For the first time in Delhi, a sports extravaganza of such a grand scale was held, in which 20,500 players participated. Every player from Delhi is connected with it. I extend my heartiest congratulations to the people of Delhi, the players, and the sports ministry," Rekha Gupta said.Ashish Sood said Delhi's youth talent will shine in every nook, and in the near future, whether at the Olympics or the National Games, Delhi's athletes will make the biggest contribution."Skills of the youth will emerge from every corner in Delhi. In the coming times, whether it's the Olympics or the National Games, Delhi's players will make the biggest contribution," Sood said.
Article Summary: Delhi chief minister rekha gupta, delhi minister ashish sood and former indian cricketer shikhar dhawan participated in the inauguration ceremony. Delhi khel mahakumbh aims to strengthen grassroots sports participation and talent identification across the capital.

Article Title: India vs Pakistan, T20 World Cup 2026 Live Streaming: When, where and how to watch IND vs PAK live on TV and online
Article Text:
DUBAI, UNITED ARAB EMIRATES - SEPTEMBER 14: Sahibzada Farhan of Pakistan bats during the Asia Cup match between India and Pakistan at Dubai International Stadium on September 14, 2025 in Dubai, United Arab Emirates. (Photo by Francois Nel/Getty Images)

Abhishek Sharma is back and India to unravel a mystery slinger

India vs Pakistan T20 World Cup 2026

: Match & Live Streaming Details

Match: India vs Pakistan, T20 World Cup 2026

Date: Sunday, February 15, 2026

Time: 7:00 PM IST

Venue: R. Premadasa Stadium, Colombo

Live TV Broadcast: Star Sports Network

Live Streaming: JioHotstar

NEW DELHI: The much-awaited India vs Pakistan match in the T20 World Cup 2026 is all set to be played on Sunday at the R Premadasa Stadium in Colombo, despite some earlier uncertainty.Both teams come into this high-pressure game after strong starts. India, the defending champions, began their campaign by beating the United States and then crushed Namibia by 93 runs.Pakistan struggled initially against the Netherlands but managed to pull off a thrilling win, followed by a comfortable victory over the USA.India and Pakistan have often been grouped together in major tournaments. They have been in the same group in the last five T20 World Cups and the previous two ODI World Cups. The last time they were in different groups was in the 2011 ODI World Cup, but they still faced each other in the semi-final, which India won before lifting the trophy.In T20 World Cup history, India has clearly dominated Pakistan. The two teams have played eight matches in the tournament so far, with India winning seven and Pakistan winning just one in 2021. India also has a strong record at the Colombo stadium, winning 11 out of 15 T20 matches there since 2009.However, rain could affect the match. Weather reports suggest a high chance of rain during the day, though the chances reduce in the evening.
Article Summary: India vs pakistan t20 world cup 2026 match to be played on sunday. Match will be played at the r premadasa stadium in colombo. Weather reports suggest a high chance of rain during the day, though the chances reduce in the evening. India and pakistan have often been grouped together in major tournaments.

Article Title: Edmonton Oilers: Edmonton Oilers worry as Leon Draisaitl appears to aggravate hand injury at Olympics against Latvia
Article Text:
Tired of too many ads? go ad free now

Fans remain worried over Leon Draisaitl‚Äôs health once he returns to the NHL

Tired of too many ads? go ad free now

Concern is mounting in Edmonton over the health of Leon Draisaitl after fans noticed the Oilers superstar repeatedly icing his right hand during Germany's Olympic Games. The injury appears to be lingering from an incident against the Minnesota Wild on January 31.Draisaitl left that game to have his right hand evaluated by the Oilers medical staff, but returned to play. With the Olympics on the horizon, any player would push through pain to represent their country at such a significant event. Unfortunately, the Olympics may be worsening whatever hand issue Draisaitl is dealing with.Fans have observed him icing his right hand on the bench after nearly every shift during Germany's first two games at the Milano Cortina 2026 tournament. Despite the apparent injury, Draisaitl continues to give his best effort for Germany.He has one goal and three assists through two Olympic games and leads all German players in shots on goal. Germany opened with a 3-1 victory over Denmark before falling 4-3 to Latvia in a stunning upset on Saturday morning. Draisaitl fired 10 shots in the loss to Latvia, over a third of Germany's total attempts.The 29-year-old center has been one of the tournament's most active shooters despite clearly managing discomfort. His willingness to play through pain shows his commitment to representing Germany on hockey's biggest stage.For the Oilers, this is major bad news. They are set to return for the home stretch of the league as they push for the playoffs. While Edmonton has managed to be within postseason contention with 64 points across 58 games, Draisaitl‚Äôs injury might put a stopper on their overall gameplay.Not to mention, the German center remains the Oilers' second-best point scorer this season with 80 points. Without him on their top line, their effectiveness could go down in a blink. In the scenario that his injury is worse than expected, he might miss the remaining regular season while his hand heals.The Oilers would prefer their superstar return at full health before the playoffs rather than playing through lingering discomfort. For now, Oilers fans can only watch nervously as Draisaitl continues representing Germany while managing what appears to be a significant hand issue.His dedication to playing through pain is admirable, but also worrying for a franchise counting on him. Germany faces the United States on Sunday at 3:10 p.m. ET to conclude Group C preliminary round play. How Draisaitl's hand holds up in that matchup could determine whether he needs treatment after returning to Edmonton.
Article Summary: Fans have noticed leon draisaitl icing his right hand during germany's first two games at the milano cortina 2026 tournament. The injury appears to be lingering from an incident against the minnesota wild on january 31. He has one goal and three assists through two olympic games and leads all german players in shots on goal.

Article Title: IND vs PAK, Colombo weather update: What happens if rain washes out India vs Pakistan T20 World Cup match?
Article Text:
R Premadasa Stadium, in Colombo, Sri Lanka. (PTI Photo/Arun Sharma)

Abhishek Sharma is back and India to unravel a mystery slinger

What happens if rain washes out IND vs PAK T20 World Cup match?

NEW DELHI: The highly anticipated India vs Pakistan match in the T20 World Cup 2026 is scheduled to be played on Sunday at the R Premadasa Stadium in Colombo, but rain could spoil the big game.Both teams have started the tournament well. India, the defending champions, beat the United States and then thrashed Namibia by 93 runs. Pakistan had a shaky start against the Netherlands but pulled off a close win and then comfortably defeated the USA.India and Pakistan have been in the same group in many recent tournaments, including the last five T20 World Cups and the previous two ODI World Cups. India has dominated Pakistan in T20 World Cup history, winning 7 out of 8 matches. India also has a strong record in Colombo, winning most of their matches at this venue.Weather forecasts show a high chance of rain during the day, though it may ease in the evening.For the match to have a result, each team must play at least five overs.If that doesn‚Äôt happen, the match will be abandoned and both teams will get one point each, since there is no reserve day for group-stage games.But weather remains out of anyone‚Äôs control.If the match is completely washed out, broadcasters will lose advertising money, and fans may get refunds on tickets, which would hurt Sri Lanka Cricket‚Äôs earnings.A washed-out India vs Pakistan match would cause major financial losses for everyone involved.
Article Summary: R premadasa stadium, in colombo, sri lanka. Weather forecasts show a high chance of rain during the day, though it may ease in the evening. India has dominated pakistan in t20 world cup history, winning 7 out of 8 matches.

Article Title: Edmonton Oilers worry as Leon Draisaitl appears to aggravate hand injury at Olympics against Latvia
Article Text:
Leon Draisaitl with the Edmonton Oilers (Via Getty Images)

Article Title: Chris Bassitt‚Äôs $500K Jays Care donation shines as Blue Jays share heartfelt message following Orioles deal
Article Text:
Chris Bassitt with his family (Image via: IG/X)

Blue Jays publicly thank Bassitt family for $500K commitment to Jays Care programs

(Image via: IG)

The end of a player‚Äôs time with a team is often measured in numbers, but for Chris Bassitt, his Toronto chapter will be remembered for something far more meaningful. As the veteran right hander officially begins a new journey in the American League East, the Toronto Blue Jays chose to highlight his impact beyond baseball. Before fans focused on contracts or roster changes, the organization made sure to recognize the difference he made in the community.Over three seasons, Bassitt and his wife Jessica committed themselves to Jays Care initiatives that support youth through sport and mentorship. Their Pitch-In initiative became a steady source of funding for programs aimed at helping children grow through baseball. The impact was not symbolic. It was financial, consistent, and deeply personal.‚ÄúThank you to Chris and Jessica Bassitt for their incredible support of Jays Care over the past three seasons. üíô Through the Bassitts Pitch-In initiative, the Bassitt family generously donated over $500,000 CAD to kids in Jays Care programs and made an immeasurable impact on our community. We‚Äôre deeply grateful and wish you all the best in your next chapter!‚ÄùThat message captured why Bassitt‚Äôs departure carries emotional weight.His $500,000 CAD donation will continue supporting children across Canada, ensuring his influence remains long after his final outing in Toronto.Now, Bassitt turns the page with the Baltimore Orioles, staying in the competitive AL East. His move keeps him in a division he knows well, but in a new uniform and role.Last season, Bassitt went 11 9 with a 3.96 ERA across 32 regular season appearances as Toronto claimed the American League pennant. During the postseason, he stepped into a relief role and posted a 1.04 ERA with 10 strikeouts in seven outings. His flexibility and steady presence proved valuable in high pressure moments.Entering his 11th major league season, Bassitt will turn 37 on Feb. 22. Throughout his career with the Chicago White Sox, Oakland Athletics, New York Mets, and Toronto, he has compiled an 83 65 record with a 3.64 ERA. For Baltimore, he adds experience and stability. For Toronto, he leaves a lasting legacy that extends far beyond the mound.
Article Summary: Blue jays thank chris bassitt for $500k commitment to jays care programs. Bassitt and his wife jessica committed themselves to initiatives that support youth through sport and mentorship. The impact was not symbolic. It was financial, consistent, and deeply personal.

Article Title: Who is Matt Weston dating? British skeleton racer nears team GB‚Äôs first Winter Olympics medal as wedding plans await
Article Text:
Matt Weston and Alex Howard-Jones (via Alex Howard-Jones/ Instagram)

Matt Weston and Alex Howard-Jones plan their wedding after Milano Cortina Winter Olympics 2026



British skeleton racer Matt Weston is on the verge of winning Great Britain‚Äôs first medal of the 2026 Winter Olympics. The 28-year-old has made a strong start in Milano Cortina and leads the standings after the opening two runs. He holds a 0.30-second advantage heading into the final runs on Friday evening. Expectations were high because he arrived as the reigning world, European and overall World Cup champion, and he has so far matched the hype.Away from the ice track, Weston is also enjoying a big year in his personal life. He is engaged to his long-time partner Alex Howard-Jones, and the couple plan to marry in July after the Games. Their relationship has been visible on social media for years, with photos together dating back to 2016. They also share their home with a ten-year-old cocker spaniel named Logan.While Matt Weston chases Milano Cortina Winter Olympics 2026 success, his fianc√©e Alex Howard-Jones has built her own career. She is a chief operating officer (COO) and a founding member of pltfrm search, an executive search firm based in London. Reportedly, the couple plans to celebrate their wedding just months after the conclusion of the Winter Olympics, meaning 2026 could become the biggest year of Weston‚Äôs life both professionally and personally.Notably, Matt Weston did not begin his sporting journey in skeleton racing. He first played rugby and later trained in taekwondo. Many people expected that he would become one of Britain‚Äôs top winter athletes. He only started skeleton racing in the summer of 2017 and made his World Cup debut in January 2020.His rise was quick. In 2021, Weston won a World Cup gold medal. It was the first time a British man had done so in more than 13 years. He then became Britain‚Äôs first skeleton world champion in eight years in 2023. The last British champion before that was Lizzie Yarnold back in 2015, while Kristan Bromley was the last British male champion in 2008.Last season proved his most successful yet. Matt Weston secured back-to-back overall World Cup titles and also reclaimed his world championship. That form made him one of the favourites for the Milano-Cortina Games.
Article Summary: British skeleton racer matt weston is on the verge of winning great britain‚Äôs first medal of the 2026 winter olympics. The 28-year-old has made a strong start in milano cortina and leads the standings after the opening two runs. Expectations were high because he arrived as the reigning world, european and overall world cup champion.

Article Title: Myles Garrett's Girlfriend Chloe Kim‚Äôs Olympic Dream Over the Years: Revisiting the Gold Streak Behind Her Silver Night
Article Text:
Chloe Kim leaves Milan Cortina with silver instead of a three peat, but her three medal Olympic run still hits harder than most careers. (Image via Getty)

2026: A torn shoulder, a silver medal, and a different kind of win

2018: Chloe Kim turns PyeongChang into a launchpad

2022: Beijing cements the back to back halfpipe champion

Where Chloe Kim sits now in snowboarding history

On a snowy night in Livigno, Italy, Chloe Kim led the women‚Äôs halfpipe final after an 88.00 opener, then watched 17 year old Gaon Choi snatch gold with a 90.25 on her last run. Kim fell on her own final attempt and settled for silver at the 2026 Winter Olympics.This was the shot at a once in a lifetime headline: the first three straight Olympic golds in any snowboarding event. Instead, Kim walks away with three Olympic medals total, two gold and one silver, and remains the only woman with back to back halfpipe titles while Shaun White still stands as the only rider with three golds overall.A month before Milan Cortina, Kim tore the labrum in her left shoulder during training in Switzerland and admitted she was unsure she would even make it to the Games.She still qualified first, then played it safe on her opening run in Livigno, banking that 88.00 while other riders slammed in heavy snow. Choi crashed hard in her first run, needed treatment in the pipe, then came back to land the run of the night and grab gold on her third attempt.Kim had a choice on that last drop: repeat the cleaner, safer first run or throw the hardest combo on her sheet, including the cab double 1080 that has defined her progression.She chose violence. She caught the wall, slid out, and the three peat vanished.Even then, she refused to mope. ‚ÄúIn my eyes, I‚Äôm a winner, because I was able to persevere and fight through,‚Äù she told reporters, per Time. On the way down the hill she walked hand in hand with boyfriend Myles Garrett of the Cleveland Browns, who called watching her ride ‚Äúexciting but terrifying.‚ÄùShe is expected to undergo shoulder surgery once she is back in the United States.Kim did not arrive in PyeongChang as a mystery. She already had X Games golds and had become the first woman to land back to back 1080s in competition.At 17, she turned that hype into something concrete, winning women‚Äôs halfpipe gold with a 93.75, then nearly touching perfection with a 98.25 on her final run. She became the youngest woman to win Olympic snowboarding gold and the youngest to land two 1080s in a row at the Games, jumping past Kelly Clark‚Äôs age record in the process.Four years later in Beijing, Kim arrived with fame, pressure, and time away from the sport behind her. She qualified first, then ended the final early with a 94.00 on her opening run in Genting Snow Park.Her last two attempts turned into lab experiments. She tried new tricks, fell both times, and still won by a margin that made everyone else look like they were fighting for silver. That result made her the first woman ever to win back to back Olympic halfpipe golds.There is still no true three peat in Olympic snowboarding. Kim‚Äôs silver joins failed bids this week from Ester Ledecka in parallel giant slalom and Anna Gasser in big air, both of whom also saw their runs at a third straight gold shut down in Milan Cortina.Kim‚Äôs resume is already in rare air: three Olympic medals, eight X Games golds and a stack of world titles, plus progression tricks like the double cork 1080 and a historic 1260 that moved the entire field‚Äôs ceiling.So yes, the golden three peat story died in the Italian snow. But the bigger picture is ugly for everyone else: even on a torn shoulder, even on a night when a teenager finally beat her, the bar in this sport still has Kim‚Äôs name on it.
Article Summary: Chloe kim fell on her final run in the women's halfpipe final in milan cortina. She had a chance to become the first woman to win three straight olympic golds in snowboarding. Instead, she won silver and remains the only woman with back to back halfpipe titles.

Article Title: Winter Olympics 2026: Norway‚Äôs Johannes H√∏sflot Kl√¶bo equals all-time gold record with stunning eighth medal
Article Text:
Winter Olympics 2026 (Image Via Getty)

‚ÄòTerrifying‚Äô Olympic Ski Star Lindsey Vonn‚Äôs Crash Seen In Shocking Photos

Johannes H√∏sflot Kl√¶bo moves level with Winter Olympics legends after dominant 10km freestyle victory

Norway‚Äôs Johannes H√∏sflot Kl√¶bo added another huge moment to his already legendary career after winning the men‚Äôs 10km freestyle race at the 2026 Winter Olympics in Milano-Cortina. The victory gave him his eighth Olympic gold medal, tying the all-time Winter Olympics record. Kl√¶bo finished 4.9 seconds ahead of France‚Äôs Mathis Desloges, showing once again why he is one of the biggest stars in cross-country skiing right now.It was also his third gold medal at these Games, making him one of the standout athletes of the tournament so far. His win quickly became one of the most talked-about moments of the day. Fans have watched him dominate event after event, and many now wonder if he will go on to break the record before these Olympics end. With more races still ahead, the Norwegian skier has a real chance to make even more history in Milan.Johannes H√∏sflot Kl√¶bo‚Äôs latest win added another chapter to a career that has already been packed with success.Before Milano-Cortina, he had won gold medals at the 2018 Winter Olympics in Pyeongchang and again at the 2022 Games in Beijing.His titles include victories in the individual sprint, team sprint, and relay events, making him one of the most complete skiers in the sport.Now tied on eight gold medals with Norwegian greats Bj√∏rn D√¶hlie, Marit Bj√∏rgen, and Ole Einar Bj√∏rndalen, Kl√¶bo has placed himself among the biggest names in Winter Olympics history.More importantly, he still has three races left at these Games: the relay, team sprint, and 50km mass start, meaning the record could soon belong to him alone.Kl√¶bo‚Äôs performances have also caught the attention of fans beyond the skiing world. A video of his uphill sprint from earlier in the Games went viral online, gaining over 15 million views on X.American skier Ben Ogden, who finished behind him in the sprint race, summed up the challenge of racing against the Norwegian by saying, ‚ÄúI like to go to every race thinking that it‚Äôs a race for the win, but these days, a lot of the time it‚Äôs a race for second.‚ÄùWith the final week of competition still ahead, all eyes are now on Kl√¶bo to see how much further he can push his Olympic legacy.
Article Summary: Johannes h√∏sflot kl√¶bo won the men‚Äôs 10km freestyle race at the 2026 winter olympics in milano-cortina. The victory gave him his eighth olympic gold medal, tying the all-time winter olympics record. It was also his third gold medal at these games, making him one of the standout athletes of the tournament.

Article Title: Slovakia continue their unbeaten run in Olympics as they edge past Italy 3-2 to stay perfect in Group B
Article Text:
Team Slovakia against Italy in group stages (Via Getty Images)

Slovakia will be facing Sweden in its last preliminary fixture



Slovakia is making believers out of everyone in Milan. After shocking the hockey world with a 4-1 dismantling of defending Olympic champion Finland in their opener, Slovakia held off a spirited Italian side 3-2 at Rho Arena on Friday to remain perfect in Group B.It was not the blowout many expected, but captain Tomas Tatar and his teammates found a way to secure the victory. Italy, playing in front of a passionate home crowd, refused to go quietly against Slovakia; they pushed even harder in today‚Äôs game.Slovakia has been the biggest dark horse so far. Despite lacking any of the firepower of the ‚ÄúBig 4 Nations,‚Äù they have thrilled fans and critics alike. Meanwhile, the hosts had already proven against Sweden that they could compete with elite competition, trailing just 2-2 in the second period before eventually falling 5-2.The 35-year-old Tatar, who spent 14 NHL seasons with six different teams, has been instrumental in Slovakia's success. He recorded 496 points across 927 regular-season games at the highest level before returning to Europe this season with Zug in Switzerland's National League.His leadership on Slovakia's top line alongside Juraj Slafkovsky and Adam Ruzicka has given the Slovaks one of the tournament's most dangerous units.Slafkovsky, the 2022 Olympic MVP, already has nine career Olympic goals at just 21 years old, trailing only Marian Hossa and Miroslav Satan on Slovakia's all-time list.Despite the loss, Italy has earned respect throughout the tournament. With zero NHL experience on their roster, they have competed hard against Sweden and Slovakia, two teams loaded with professional talent.The host nation has shown they belong at this level, even if the results have not gone their way. Their supporters at Rho Arena created an electric atmosphere that nearly willed them to an upset. Slovakia sits atop Group B at 2-0-0-0 following their narrow victory.Finland has already bounced back from their opening loss with a 4-1 win over Sweden in Friday's other Group B action, leaving the group wide open heading into the final round of preliminary games. Sweden falls to 1-0-0-1, while Italy remains winless at 0-0-0-2.Slovakia faces Sweden on Saturday in a battle for Group B supremacy. Italy closes its preliminary round against Finland, still searching for their first Olympic victory with NHL players on the ice since 2006.
Article Summary: Slovakia held off a spirited italian side 3-2 at rho arena on friday to remain perfect in group b. The hosts had already proven against sweden that they could compete with elite competition. Italy closes its preliminary round against finland, still searching for their first olympic victory with nhl players on the ice since 2006.

Article Title: Jannik Sinner left in awe as Federica Brignone turns injury nightmare into Winter Olympics gold
Article Text:
Jannik Sinner and Federica Brignone (Image Via Getty)

Jannik Sinner applauds Federica Brignone‚Äôs comeback as Italian skier wins Super-G gold at Milano-Cortina Winter Olympics

Italian tennis star Jannik Sinner shared heartfelt words for fellow Italian athlete Federica Brignone after her inspiring gold medal win at the 2026 Winter Olympics in Milano-Cortina. Brignone, who suffered a serious leg injury less than a year ago, returned to competition and claimed gold in the Super-G event. Her victory quickly became one of the biggest stories of the Games, not just because of the medal, but because of the difficult journey she went through to get back on the slopes.The 35-year-old skier had broken her left leg during the Italian championships and needed two major surgeries. Many people believed she might miss the Olympics completely. Instead, she returned in remarkable fashion and even set a new milestone by becoming the oldest Alpine skier to win Olympic gold. After the race, Sinner openly admired her determination and praised her effort in a moving reaction.Jannik Sinner spoke about Brignone‚Äôs achievement in an interview with La Gazzetta dello Sport, calling her comeback extraordinary.He said, ‚ÄúShe‚Äôs a phenomenon. After everything she‚Äôs been through, being able to come back and achieve this result is something extraordinary.‚ÄùSinner had earlier spoken about how difficult injury recovery can be, especially in a sport like skiing. During the Australian Open, he explained that skiing carries huge risks and long recovery periods.He said, ‚ÄúSkiing and tennis are totally different sports because on the slopes, if you get hurt during the season, you‚Äôre out all year. It‚Äôs a really dangerous sport; when you step out of the gate, you have to be brave.‚ÄùHe also praised Brignone‚Äôs hard work behind the scenes, adding, ‚ÄúWhat Federica has done‚Ä¶ to be able to experience the Olympics is incredible‚Ä¶ she‚Äôs done something incredible that almost no one can do.‚ÄùWhile Brignone celebrates her historic win, Sinner is now turning his attention back to tennis. The Italian started his 2026 season at the Australian Open but lost in the semifinals to Novak Djokovic.He is expected to return to action at the Qatar Open in Doha, where rival Carlos Alcaraz is also set to compete. Djokovic, however, has withdrawn from the tournament.Brignone‚Äôs victory and Sinner‚Äôs reaction have brought together two major Italian sports stories, showing how athletes from different fields often inspire each other during big moments like the Winter Olympics.
Article Summary: Federica brignone won gold in the super-g event at the 2026 winter olympics in milano-cortina. The 35-year-old skier had broken her left leg during the italian championships and needed two major surgeries. Tennis star jannik sinner openly admired her determination and praised her effort.

Article Title: Auston Matthews shares thoughts on Team USA's opening win over Latvia at the 2026 Winter Olympics
Article Text:
Team USA captain Auston Matthews‚Äô timely score helped Team USA register its first win over Latvia (Image via Getty Images)

Auston Matthews‚Äô final goal help Team USA secure their victory over Latvia in their opening match

Every Auston Matthews Goal From The 2021-22 NHL Season

Team USA just had a brilliant opening campaign at the 2026 Winter Olympics, as the team defeated Team Latvia. The United States opened its chase for the gold medal by scoring 5-1 at Milano Santagiulia Ice Hockey Arena on Thursday (12 February). Reports suggest that it is USA Captain Auston Matthews and the team members‚Äô scoring effort that led the team to win over Latvia in their opening match.According to reports, Toronto Maple Leafs star was one of four Americans to score in the preliminary round victory. According to TSN, Auston Matthews has scored more goals than any other player since he entered the NHL. But the goal he scored on Thursday night felt very different.The team initially faced certain hiccups in their opening match, with two apparent goals overturned in the first period after successful challenges by the Latvian bench. Despite the scoreboard remaining tied 1-1 after 20 minutes, Team USA maintained its focus and turned the tables with a dominant second period.Team USA captain Auston Matthews ‚Äô timely score helped Team USA register its first win over Latvia at the opening match of the Winter Olympic Games of men‚Äôs ice hockey.Matthews scored the final goal in Team USA‚Äôs 5-1 win over Latvia, despite having a tough start with two goals not counting and a quick 1-1 tie, but the team managed to come back strong.Sharing his thoughts on their opening win, Team USA captain told TSN, ‚ÄúIt‚Äôs pretty cool. This is such a special opportunity, and still feels pretty surreal to be here and be able to compete and put on this jersey and play with this group of guys. It‚Äôs a great start for us in this tournament, and we‚Äôll look to build off it.‚ÄùMatthews further spoke about the early adversities the team faced at the initial stage, ‚ÄúIt‚Äôs fine. Those things happen all the time. You know, can‚Äôt really complain about it. The ref maybe didn‚Äôt see it. Was a little shaken up, but felt fine and just kept playing and just go from there,‚Äù he said.As per reports, Brady Tkachuk scored first at 5:29 in the first period with help from his brother Matthew. In the second period, Team USA took control as the team got three goals from Brock Nelson and Tage Thompson. Besides, Jack Hughes also had two assists on Nelson's goals, and Quinn Hughes, Matthew Tkachuk, and Jack Eichel had two assists too.Even coach Mike Sullivan appreciated the effort of the team for staying calm and following the correct game strategy. Meanwhile, Team USA stayed off the ice on Friday, as they will take on Denmark on Saturday in the second of three preliminary-round games.
Article Summary: Team usa captain auston matthews scored the final goal in team usa‚Äôs 5-1 win over latvia. The team initially faced certain hiccups in their opening match, with two apparent goals overturned in the first period. Despite the scoreboard remaining tied 1-1 after 20 minutes, team usa maintained its focus and turned the tables with a dominant second period.

Article Title: NBA legend Chris Paul announces retirement, bringing an end to 21 memorable seasons
Article Text:
Chris Paul (Image Source: Getty)

Chris Paul‚Äôs rise from rookie of the year to perennial All-Star

Chris Paul's retirement marks the end of a historic statistical legacy

Chris Paul, one of the best and most respected point guards in NBA history, has officially called it quits after 21 seasons in the NBA. Confirming the end of his storied career, the 40-year-old made the announcement in an emotional statement. Paul embodied elite leadership, precise playmaking, and fierce competitiveness over the next two-plus decades, cementing a legacy as one of the greatest floor generals in the history of the sport.Paul has been a consistent Hall of Fame-level talent since back when he was a teenage legend. The retirement closes the book on a career that spanned three eras of the NBA and signals the end of one of the most impactful careers the league has seen.Chris Paul was the fourth overall pick in the 2005 NBA Draft, selected by the then-New Orleans Hornets; he quickly became a franchise player. Winning the NBA Rookie of the Year award in 2006, he was soon distinguished by his nearly unparalleled awareness on the court, his ball handling, and his defensive acumen.During his career, Paul was named to 12 NBA All-Star selections, received 11 All-NBA honors, and nine consecutive All-Defensive Team nods.His leadership made several franchises better, and most famously, he led the Los Angeles Clippers to heights they had never reached before, guiding the ‚ÄúLob City‚Äù era and making the team a regular playoff team.Aside from his stint with the Clippers, Paul played a pivotal role for the Houston Rockets, Oklahoma City Thunder, Phoenix Suns, Golden State Warriors, and San Antonio Spurs. He took the Suns to the 2021 NBA Finals, two wins short of clinching the elusive title that eluded him during his Phoenix playing days.Chris Paul's retirement was swift, but it ended a career filled with records and consistent greatness. He's 2nd all-time assists and steals 2nd respectively, arguing his position as the greatest playmaker and best perimeter defender of all-time. Reinforcing his blend of scoring and distribution, Paul has scored more than 20,000 points while recording over 10,000 assists.Paul should have a room full of those fine letters, but no NBA title ever be displayed, crowning his r√©sum√©. He was president of the National Basketball Players Association, a trusty mentor to younger stars, and an embodiment of professionalism and basketball smarts.
Article Summary: Chris paul has announced his retirement after 21 seasons in the nba. The 40-year-old made the announcement in an emotional statement. Paul was named to 12 nba all-star selections, received 11 all-nba honors, and nine consecutive all-defensive team nods. He has scored more than 20,000 points while recording over 10,000 assists.

Article Title: Kyle Busch and Samantha Busch's combined net worth: NASCAR victories, endorsements, and entrepreneurship shaping their growing family fortune
Article Text:
Kyle Busch and Samantha Busch's combined net worth: NASCAR victories, endorsements, and entrepreneurship shaping their growing family fortune (Image Via Getty Images)

Kyle Busch‚Äôs NASCAR career earnings and major income sources

Samantha Busch‚Äôs business work and role in the family net worth

Kyle Thomas' early life, records, and recent career update

Kyle Thomas' personal life, charity work, and public image

Kyle Busch is one of the top-performing and most successful drivers in the history of NASCAR. His longstanding career as a driver and so-called "sponsorship deals" have helped him create a considerable amount of wealth through many years of continuing success in racing and on-track performance. In addition to Kyle's accomplishments, Samantha Busch has contributed significantly as an entrepreneur and celebrity into creating the Busch family wealth.Kyle Busch is a two-time NASCAR Cup Series champion and one of the sport‚Äôs highest-paid drivers. Reports in late 2025 estimated he earned about $16.9 million in a year, placing him among the top earners in NASCAR. In strong seasons, he typically makes $15 million to $20 million from salary, race prizes, and endorsements.During his full career, Busch has earned around $100 million from race winnings and nearly the same amount from sponsorships and brand deals. A major financial move also came when he sold Kyle Busch Motorsports, adding to his overall wealth.Samantha Busch is known as an entrepreneur, author, and philanthropist. While the reported $80 million net worth mainly reflects Kyle Busch‚Äôs racing income, Samantha‚Äôs business projects and public work add to the family‚Äôs total financial stability, according to the Celebrity Net Worth.Her involvement in charity work and awareness programs has also made the Busch family well known beyond racing.Kyle Thomas Busch was born May 2, 1985 in Las Vegas, Nevada, where he learned to drive at age 6. He began his racing career at a young age and broke numerous records as he raced under the NASCAR umbrella by winning races at many different tracks.In September 2022, Kyle signed a multi-year contract with Richard Childress Racing to help him maintain his competitiveness in the NASCAR Cup Series. Kyle continues to race regularly through the 2026 season, which allows him to continue his place among the top-tier drivers in NASCAR.As for Kyle's personal life, he married Samantha Sarcinella in 2010. Together they have two kids. In addition to being an accomplished racer, Kyle founded the Kyle Busch Foundation in 2006, a nonprofit organization that supports children in need. He also supports various animal rescue organizations and donated race winnings to the American Red Cross after the devastation of Hurricane Katrina.Together, these charitable causes and initiatives create a public image for Kyle and Samantha as successful and socially responsible members of American motorsports.
Article Summary: Kyle busch is a two-time nascar cup series champion and one of the sport‚Äôs highest-paid drivers. During his full career, busch has earned around $100 million from race winnings and nearly the same amount from sponsorships and brand deals. In september 2022, kyle signed a multi-year contract with richard childress racing to help him maintain his competitiveness.

Article Title: NBA All Star Weekend 2026: Full schedule, new USA vs World format, how to watch live and full teams list
Article Text:
NBA All Star Weekend 2026: Full schedule, new USA vs World format, how to watch live and full teams list (Image via Getty)

Full NBA All Star Weekend schedule, teams and how to stream free on Peacock, NBC and ESPN

USA Stripes

World

In the Slam Dunk Contest,

The NBA All Star Weekend 2026 is here, and everything leads to Sunday night at Intuit Dome in Inglewood, California. The main All Star Championship Game will be played on February 15. This year feels different. Instead of the usual format, three teams, USA Stars, USA Stripes, and World, will face each other in a round robin style. Most games will air on NBC and stream on Peacock, while some events will be on ESPN and NBA TV. The action runs from Friday, February 13, to Sunday, February 15.Let‚Äôs start with the schedule so you do not miss anything.Now let‚Äôs look at who is playing., coached by J B Bickerstaff, include Scottie Barnes, Devin Booker, Cade Cunningham, Jalen Duren, Anthony Edwards, Chet Holmgren, Jalen Johnson and Tyrese Maxey., coached by Mitch Johnson, feature Jaylen Brown, Jalen Brunson, Stephen Curry, Brandon Ingram, Kevin Durant, LeBron James, Kawhi Leonard, Donovan Mitchell and Norman Powell., coached by Darko Rajakoviƒá, have Giannis Antetokounmpo, Deni Avdija, Luka Donƒçiƒá, Shai Gilgeous Alexander, Nikola Jokiƒá, Jamal Murray, Pascal Siakam, Alperen ≈ûeng√ºn, Karl Anthony Towns and Victor Wembanyama. Stephen Curry and Shai Gilgeous Alexander are listed as injured.Keshad Johnson, Jase Richardson, Carter Bryant and Jaxson Hayes will compete. The 3 Point Contest includes Damian Lillard, Devin Booker, Kon Kneuppel, Tyrese Maxey, Jamal Murray, Donovan Mitchell, Bobby Portis and Norman Powell.If you do not have cable, you can stream on Peacock. An ad supported plan costs 10.99 dollars per month, while Premium Plus is 16.99 dollars. Walmart Plus members can get Peacock included in their membership. DirecTV, Hulu plus Live TV and YouTube TV also offer free trials to watch NBC. This schedule and broadcast information is based on details shared by Yahoo Sports and official league listings.
Article Summary: The nba all star weekend 2026 is here, and everything leads to sunday night at intuit dome in inglewood, california. The action runs from friday, february 13, to sunday, february 15. Most games will air on nbc and stream on peacock, while some events will be on espn and nba tv.

Article Title: Team Canada announces Brad Marchand and Josh Morrissey's absence from lineup ahead of clash against Switzerland
Article Text:
Canada will be without forward Brad Marchand and defenseman Josh Morrissey (Image via Getty Images)

Seth Jarvis to make Olympic debut as Brad Marchand and Josh Morrissey to remain absent

Team Canada will play without two key players as they are all set to lock horns against Team Switzerland in their upcoming men's ice hockey action at the 2026 Winter Olympics, scheduled for Friday. The news has been confirmed recently by the International Ice Hockey Federation (IIHF) ahead of their clash against the opponent team.The decision came as Josh Morrissey sustained an undisclosed injury recently during Canada‚Äôs opening match against Czechia. While Brad Marchand‚Äôs reason for exclusion is unknown at this time. The 37-year-old had one assist in 9:29 of play in Canada‚Äôs bottom-six in his first Olympic appearance, according to reports.Earlier, Canada kicked off its Olympic campaign in Group A with a 5-0 win over Czechia, where 19-year-old Macklin Celebrini opened the score for the team on 12 February, as reported by Olympics.com. Meanwhile, Czechia also gave a tough fight to the mighty Canadians. Team Canada will play on February 13, 2026, without two key players due to injury and other unfortunate circumstances. These key players are Brad Marchand and Josh Morrissey, who are considered the marquee players of the team.Their absence from today‚Äôs lineup was confirmed by IIHF. However, Team Canada will replace these players with two other significant players.According to Daily Faceoff, Josh Morrissey will miss the match, as he was last seen leaving Canada‚Äôs tournament opener on Thursday against Czechia after sustaining an injury. At present, the status of Morrissey‚Äôs injury is unclear, but if he is unable to return, his roster spot will be difficult to replace after Canada officially registered 25 players on February 10.Announcing the same on X/Twitter, Steven Ellis stated, ‚ÄúBoth Brad Marchand and Josh Morrissey are listed as scratches for Canada today against Switzerland. Jordan Binnington also went dress. #Olympics.‚Äù Meanwhile, according to Kyle Bukauskas, "Brad Marchand is taking a rest, too." It is expected that Marchand will be back, but for now, he can recharge and get ready for the upcoming important matches.As per reports, in place of these players, Carolina‚Äôs Seth Jarvis will make his Olympic debut. He will play alongside Bo Horvat and Sam Reinhart on Canada‚Äôs third line. The other three forward lines will remain untouched, with Sam Bennett serving as the 13th forward. In addition, this defenseman, Travis Sanheim, will take Morrissey‚Äôs place as the seventh defenseman for the match.It will be interesting to see what Team Canada will display with their strong and talented team against Switzerland at the Milano Santagiulia Arena, with both teams looking to secure positioning in the Olympic preliminary round.
Article Summary: Seth jarvis to make olympic debut as brad marchand and josh morrissey to remain absent. Team canada will play against team switzerland on february 13, 2026, without two key players due to injury and other unfortunate circumstances. The news has been confirmed by the international ice hockey federation (iihf)

Article Title: Fact check: Did Bad Bunny and Kendall Jenner leave together after his controversial Super Bowl LX performance?
Article Text:
Did Bad Bunny and Kendall Jenner leave together after his controversial Super Bowl LX performance where she cheered him on?(Image via Getty Images)

Bad Bunny‚Äôs moment with Kendall Jenner sparks chaos after she cheered him on at Super Bowl LX

Bad Bunny has divided the country with his Super Bowl LX performance

Bad Bunny, the Super Bowl LX halftime show headliner, broke records on Sunday night with his performance even though it has divided the country.While Bad Bunny set the stage on fire, his ex girlfriend and supermodel, Kendall Jenner, was also spotted at the show along with her sister, Kim Kardashian and her new romance, Lewis Hamilton. Amid this, a clip of Bad Bunny and Kendall Jenner leaving together in a luxurious car has sparked chaos.A few hours ago, a clip of the popular Grammy winner Bad Bunny and Kendall Jenner hopping into his $3 million Buggati Chiron have sparked panic among fans.Much to the disappointment of fans, the clip is actually three years old. The popular clip was taken in April 2023 when Bad Bunny and Kendall Jenner were publicly dating and had gone to Tyler, the Creator‚Äôs concert.The ‚ÄúDeb√≠ Tirar M√°s Fotos‚Äù artist, Bad Bunny and Kendall Jenner went public with their high profile relationship in 2023 but went their separate ways by the end of that year.Later, in 2024, the two did get back together for a few months but ended things again. Since then, both Bad Bunny and Kendall Jenner have moved on in their respective lives with other people.While Bad Bunny‚Äôs picture at the 68th Annual Grammy Awards with Kendall Jenner‚Äôs best friends, Hailey Bieber, and Justin Bieber did spark rumors of a reunion, nothing has been confirmed yet.Neither Bad Bunny nor Kendall Jenner have commented on rumors of them rekindling their romance yet.Despite their high profile relationship coming to a dramatic end, it seems both remain on friendly terms as Kendall Jenner was even spotted enjoying Bad Bunny‚Äôs record breaking performance at Super Bowl LX halftime show.While Bad Bunny‚Äôs show broke records, it has also divided citizens across the country and the world.To make things worse, President Donald Trump has brutally slammed Bad Bunny‚Äôs performance at Super Bowl LX.President Donald Trump took to social media to post, ‚ÄúThe Super Bowl Halftime Show is absolutely terrible, one of the worst, EVER! It makes no sense, is an affront to the Greatness of America, and doesn‚Äôt represent our standards of Success, Creativity, or Excellence‚Ä¶‚ÄùHowever, Bad Bunny has stayed away from commenting on it.
Article Summary: A clip of bad bunny and kendall jenner leaving together in a luxurious car has sparked chaos among fans. The popular clip was taken in april 2023 when the two were publicly dating and had gone to tyler, the creator‚Äôs concert. The ‚Äúdeb√≠ tirar m√°s fotos‚Äù artist and supermodel went public with their high profile relationship in 2023 but went their separate ways by the end of that year.
